title: Company of Heroes Anthology Patches to 2.602 + Cracks
description:
Company of Heroes Anthology Patches to 2.602 + Cracks


Company of Heroes: Tales of Valor v2.602 NoDVD/Fixed EXE
by reddragon105

Unlike other cracks, this one enables you to play the original Company of Heroes and Company of Heroes: Opposing Fronts campaigns in Tales of Valor without having any of the disks in the drive or even using mini-images!


Instructions:

1) Install Company of Heroes - Tales of Valor. When asked for a serial number, use 0000-0000-0000-0000-0000

(If you already have the game installed, you can change the serial number in the registry at HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWARETHQCompany of HeroesCoHProductKey, then you will also need to delete the Cache folder in DocumentsMy GamesCompany of Heroes before you run the game.)

2) Update to v2.602

3) Copy cracked content over to game install directory

4) Play!

The other campaigns should already be activated. If not, click on one of the padlocks and enter the key 0000-0000-0000-0000-0000. This should permanently unlock all of them!
